EmailTemplate.description: IN USE - Email is sent to the Applicant when the Applicantion is sent for Internal Review
EmailTemplate.name: Application Submission for Review
EmailTemplate.subject: Application {!Application__c.Name} submitted for Internal Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification of Application {!Application__c.Name} submitted for Internal Review
Hello {!Application__c.OwnerFullName},
This email is to inform you that the Application {!Application__c.Name} has been submitted for Internal Review.
Application Details:
Application Number: {!Application__c.Name}
Application Title: {!Application__c.Title__c}
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely.
EGMS Team
